name: Literature Quiz: The Pretty Committee Strikes Back: 10 Questions | Harrison, Lisi

questions.explanation:
go-gurt.

	Her food obsession was oatmeal in the book "The Clique". It was popsicles in the book "Revenge of the Wannabees". It was popcorn and mustard in the book "Best Friends For Never".

false.

	Josh likes Claire, but she likes Cam.

Josh.

	Alicia like Josh but Josh likes Claire.

questions.text: Who holds a secret kissing clinic?
questions.explanation:
Massie.

	She holds the clinic so she can get her reputation back.

questions.text: How does Claire get Cam back?
questions.correct: she sneaks over to his cabin
options: she asks him if he wants her back
questions.explanation:
she sneaks over to his cabin.

	She dresses up like a boy, goes over to his cabin, and explains everything.

questions.text: The trip they went on was to Lake George.
questions.explanation:
false.

	They went to Lake Placid.

true.

	She kisses Cam when he sneaks over to her cabin dressed like a girl.

questions.text: What color rhinestones does Layne put on her sneakers?
questions.explanation:
black.

	Claire put pink rhinestones on her sneakers.

questions.correct: She saw her mom kissing her geography teacher
options: Chris liked someone else instead of her
She was never traumatized, Massie was
questions.explanation:
She saw her mom kissing her geography teacher.

	Her geography teacher is Mr. Myner.
